meanings.definition: An address or location, especially an email address.
meanings.sent1: I sent an email to my friend's addy.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to include your addy when filling out the form.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sent the email to the wrong addy!
meanings.sent4: Her addy was like a digital doorway to her world.
meanings.sent5: Remembering the addy is crucial for online communication.

meanings.definition: A slang term for the drug Adderall.
meanings.sent1: Some students misuse addy as a study aid.
meanings.sent2: He took some addy to help him focus during exams.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the secret to his energy was addy!
meanings.sent4: In college, addy was the magic pill for late-night study sessions.
meanings.sent5: The dangers of abusing addy are well-known in academic circles.

meanings.definition: A nickname for the name Addison.
meanings.sent1: Addy is a cute nickname for Addison.
meanings.sent2: She introduced herself as Addy, short for Addison.
meanings.sent3: I teased my friend Addy about her long name.
meanings.sent4: Addy's personality was as vibrant as her nickname.
meanings.sent5: Addy's smile lit up the room whenever she entered.
